#summary Instructions for IEEE Service Cup reviewers

Thank you for agreeing to review the Hackystat system for 2009 IEEE Service
Cup. This page provides a step-by-step guide for logging in to the public
!ProjectBrowser service with a test account in order to get a feel for the
system.

== Bring up the !ProjectBrowser home page ==

To access the public instance of the !ProjectBrowser service, click [http://dasha.ics.hawaii.edu:9879/projectbrowser/ here].

You should see the following page:

[http://hackystat.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/IEEEServiceCupReview.pb.gif]
